PC Tools Internet Security 2011 8.0.0.624 + Serials

Description

Comprehensive security with this anti-spyware program Editor's Choice with antivirus and firewall.

* Recommended by experts and publications around the world.
* A powerful firewall with protection against spyware and viruses in a single application.
* A FREE service customer service award for its excellent quality.
* The security of your team is guaranteed at all times thanks to its advanced system updates.
* Detects, removes and blocks all types of spyware, adware, viruses, trojans, worms, keyloggers and other threats.
* Protection from hackers, intruders and unauthorized communications.
* Its intelligent automatic protection makes it the easiest to use.

The best protection against spyware. Chosen by millions of users around the world.

PC Tools Internet Security includes Spyware Doctor, the anti-spyware world's most awarded. Only Spyware Doctor has had more than 100 million downloads each week, a million more. Millions of people worldwide use Spyware Doctor to protect your identity and ensure the security of your computer from spyware, adware and other malicious threats.

Spyware Doctor has been honored repeatedly as the "Editor's Choice and Best of the Year, by leading PC magazines and highlighted by the testing laboratories around the world, both in the United States and the United Kingdom, Sweden , Germany and Australia. Spyware Doctor continues to reap the most prominent awards from leading publications in the computer industry worldwide as PC Magazine, PC World, PC Pro, PC Plus, PC Authority, PC Utilities, PC Advisor, PC Choice, Microdatorn, PC Answers Magazine , while achieving a score of five stars on websites such as CNET'sand Tucows.

Detects, removes and blocks spyware and viruses.

He knew that many of the programs were compared with Spyware Doctor detected only a small fraction of Spyware and completely removed an even smaller amount? What's more, first of all, most of these programs were not able to block effectively and instantly and prevent spyware being installed on users' computers.

PC Tools Internet Security offers protection against spyware and viruses and has the most advanced update feature of the market thanks to their daily reinforcing anti-spyware options. As threats become increasingly sophisticated to avoid detection, PC Tools Internet Security responds with new technology to stay one step ahead of them.


Defraggler 2.02.253

Description

Defraggler v2.02.253 is the new version of this excellent free defrag, hand Piriform (CCleaner, Recuva, Speccy). Defraggler is available in Spanish, and brings several enhancements in version, such as increased speed and accuracy of search algorithm, and other improvements that we will see below. Defraggler is available for Windows operating systems XP, Vista and Windows 7.

Defraggler, has as one of its main features and to other defragmenters free, able to defragment individual files and folders, making it a powerful tool when choosing a program of this type.
